alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:09PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Todd County through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Littleburg, or 13 miles southeast of Mission, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Littleburg around 615 PM CDT. Hidden Timber around 625 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central South Dakota.
